name: DebtScanner
description: Monthly technical debt scanner that identifies code smells, TODOs, and improvement opportunities

trigger.description: Runs on the 1st of each month at 10:00 AM UTC

prompt.template:
Scan the codebase for technical debt and improvement opportunities:
- TODO/FIXME/HACK comments
- Code duplication
- Complex functions (high cyclomatic complexity)
- Outdated dependencies
- Missing tests
- Poor error handling

Generate a prioritized technical debt report with recommendations.
